name: SmartKiddo
0:
”Alexa, ask smart kiddo for a superhero fact”
”Alexa, ask smart kiddo to give me a superhero fact”
”Alexa, ask smart kiddo to tell me a superhero trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart kiddo
des:
With this skill, you can get information about All DC and Marvel Superheroes of all time.
It's a Fact skill, tells the facts of the different characters. Useful for some unique facts about Superheroes characters.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
